Description: model type of the Trossen Arm.
End effector variant of the Trossen Arm.
Side of the Trossen Arm. Note that only the wxai follower variant has a left and right side.
IP address of the robot to connect to.
Use real or mocked hardware interface.
Use world frame if set to ``true``.
URDF of the robot; this is typically generated by the xacro command.
Default: Command(FindExec\(``xacro``\) + ' ' + LocalVar('FindPackageShare\(pkg= ``trossen_arm_description``\) + 'urdf' + LaunchConfig\(``robot_model``\)') + '.urdf.xacro ' + 'use_world_frame:=' + LaunchConfig\(``use_world_frame``\) + ' ' + 'arm_variant:=' + LaunchConfig\(``arm_variant``\) + ' ' + 'arm_side:=' + LaunchConfig\(``arm_side``\) + ' ' + 'ros2_control_hardware_type:=' + LaunchConfig\(``ros2_control_hardware_type``\) + ' ' + 'ip_address:=' + LaunchConfig\(``ip_address``\))
